author: rubys
msg: Move classpath from sh/bat into xml.  Prep for building moo in main.

author: rubys
msg: NullPointerException when srcDir contains no matches in Javac

author: rubys
msg: Fix for JDK1.1.8 on Windows...directories are not created unless the
slashes are in the right direction.  Cosmetic changes were also made
to make the logging more consistent with the other taskdefs.

author: rubys
msg: Eliminate duplicated code in Jar.java and Zip.java taskdefs by making
Jar.java extend Zip.java.  A desirable result of this is the ability to
specify an "items" value of "*" for Jar tasks indicating inclusion into
the jar file of all files/dirs in the basedir directory.

author: rubys
msg: Add support for the optimize flag in Javac
